description: Demolition of existing side extension and rear detached outbuilding. Erection of single-storey flat roof rear and side extension and single-storey flat roof rear detached outbuilding
decision_conditions: The proposed side extension by virtue of its design and siting, in particular the roof design, would diminish the distinctive character and appearance of the existing dwelling and would appear visually intrusive within the street scene resulting in unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the host dwelling and wider area and  would result in harm to the significance of the Kingston Hill/Coombe Hill Strategic Area of Special Character, contrary to Paragraph 203 of the NPPF, 2021, Policy Paragraph HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The applicant has failed to demonstrate through the submission of cogent information that the proposed development would not result in harm to the health and longevity of a tree covered by a tree protection order. The proposal would not accord with Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
